text:
I`ve been exproting images from Adobe Illustrator 9.0 to svg containing text set
in a matrix. The result comes out nice in IE and Nescape with correct
proportions but when tranformed in to PDF using FOP and all the text runs wild.
I`ve ben doing some test and seems that the values of the text matrix gets
doubled in the transformation. When I reduse the values of the text matrix in
half befor transforming the result comes out the way it is supposed to.

All text I have seen has the correct size.
If this is still a problem with the latest version attach a test.
